translation.en: Hurry, or they'll kill us all!
Hurry!
Do your breasts still give milk?
Where are you going?
They have asked for her.
Sir? This is her.
The girl who tells fortunes?
They're doing a magic spell to make it win a race.
The horse's name is Meaghan Boy.
Kemp ton, 3:00, Monday.
You ladies have a bet yourselves but don't tell anyone else.
translation.ko: 판돈을 걸어도 좋아 다만 너희만 알고 있어

translation.en: [preacher] ...and Abraham made his home in a cave,
translation.ko: 아브라함은 동굴 안에 집을 지었지만 만족했다

translation.en: but it was good because God resided there with him.
translation.ko: 아브라함은 동굴 안에 집을 지었지만 만족했다 신께서 그와 함께였기 때문이다

translation.en: You see, children, God does not care
translation.ko: 내 얘기 들어 봐요 신은 우리를 사랑해요

translation.en: if you live in a slum or in a mansion.
God does not care if you are rich or you are poor.
Morning, sir.
[policeman] Good morning, Mr. Shelby.
[man 2] Morning, Mr. Shelby.
[Thomas] Finn?
Arthur's mad as hell.
What does a ten-year-old know about hell, eh?
I'm 11 Sunday.
[man] Get your bets in now.
translation.ko: 얼마 안 남았어요! 배당 올라갑니다! 빨리 걸어요!

translation.en: [John] Tommy! Tommy! Tommy, look at the book.
- Just look. - Tommy!
- All on Meaghan Boy. - Good work, John.
translation.ko: - 다들 모나한 보이에 걸었어 - 존, 잘했어

translation.en: Tommy!
Get in here, now!
That'll be six pennies, Nipper. That's ten bob you'll see for that.
You was seen doing the powder trick down at Garrison Courts.
translation.ko: 너 개리슨 코트에서 가루 가지고 장난쳤다며?

translation.en: Times are hard.
People need a reason to lay a bet.
There was a Chinese.
The washer women say she's a witch.
It helps them believe.
We don't mess with Chinese.
- Look at the book-- - Chinese have cutters of their own.
translation.ko: - 장부 봐 봐 - 걔들은 구역이 따로 있어

translation.en: We agreed, Arthur.
I'm taking charge of drumming up new money.
translation.ko: 자금 모으는 일은 내가 알아서 한다고

translation.en: What if Meaghan Boy wins, Tommy?
You fixing races now?
Do you have permission from Billy Kimber to be fixing races, mm?
What's got into you?
You think we can take on the Chinese and Billy Kimber.
translation.ko: 우리는 중국 애들이랑 빌리 킴버한테 상대가 안 돼

translation.en: - Billy's got a bloody army-- - I think, Arthur.
translation.ko: 그 사람한테 감히... 다 생각이 있어

translation.en: That's what I do.
I think.
So that you don't have to.
There's news from Belfast.
I'm calling a family council tonight at 8:00.
I want all of us there.
You hear me?
There's trouble coming.
All right, shut up now. Shut up.
Comrades, we're here today to take a vote on strike action.
translation.ko: 동지들 우리는 오늘 파업 투표를 위해 모였다

translation.en: But before we have a show of hands for that,
let's have a show of hands from all those who fought in France.
All those who stood side by side with your comrades
and watched your comrades fall.
Raise your hands.
The blood shed on Flanders Fields,
the sweat of your brows...
Who reaps the rewards?
- Is it you? - [crowd] No!
- Is it your wives? - No!
- Who, then, do they stand among us? - No!
Or do they sit at home comfortable with a full belly
while you scrape to find enough to put shoes on your children's feet!
[crowd] Yes! And what is the reward they offer you for your sacrifices made?
A fucking cut in your wages.
That is your reward.
Raise a hand, all those who want to strike.
[all] Yes!
On the house, Mr. Shelby.
- I'll take a Mild. - [Harry] Right.
Cheers, Thomas, good health to you.
The crown of a prince.
Soon to be king, I'd bet. You don't bet.
translation.ko: - 곧 왕이 된다는 데 걸지 - 넌 내기 안 하잖아

translation.en: No, but these past few days I've been speculating.
About what?
One of my Union comrades has a sister
who works in the telegraph office at the BSA factory.
She says, over the past week they've had messages coming up
translation.ko: 그 여자 말로는 지난주 내내 런던에서 전보가 들어왔대

translation.en: from London to the brass, from Winston Churchill himself.
Something about a robbery.
"A robbery of national significance," it said.
She found a list of names left on the telegraph machine.
And on that list was your name and my name together.
translation.ko: 거기 자네 이름이랑 내 이름이 있대

translation.en: What kind of a list would have the name of a communist and the name of a bookmaker side by side?
translation.ko: 공산주의자랑 마권업자 이름이 같이 있을 명단이 뭐가 있지?

translation.en: Perhaps it's a list of men who give false hope to the poor.
translation.ko: 가난한 자들에게 희망 고문하는 사람들 명단인가?

translation.en: The only difference between you and me, Freddie,
is that sometimes my horses stand a chance of winning.
translation.ko: 그래도 내 쪽은 이기면 돈이라도 번다는 거야

translation.en: You know, there are days when I hear about the cuttings and beatings
translation.ko: 너한테 이따위 천박한 돈 얘기 들을 때마다 프랑스에서 널 살려 준 게 후회돼

translation.en: that I really wish I'd let you take that bullet in France.
translation.ko: 프랑스에서 널 살려 준 게 후회돼

translation.en: Believe me, there are nights I wish you had.
translation.ko: 나도 마찬가지야 나도 안 죽은 게 후회돼

translation.en: Hey!
- They're going to get me! - On three.
- They are going to get me! - One, two, three, down!
translation.ko: - 날 죽일 거라고! - 하나, 둘, 셋, 눕혀!

translation.en: - Breathe, Danny, breathe. - They're going to get me!
translation.ko: - 대니, 숨 쉬어 봐 - 날 죽일 거야! 날 죽일 거라고!

translation.en: They're going to get me!
Danny. Danny. Danny, you're home.
We're all home in England. You are not in France.
You're not an artillery shell, Danny, you're a man.
Hey?
You're not a whiz-bang. You're a human being, Danny.
You're all right. You're all right.
Up! Up!
It's all right.
It's all right.
Ah! Hell!
Did I do it again?
You did it again, Danny.
You got to stop doing this, man.
- It's all right. - Oh, God! Mr. Shelby, I'm sorry.
It's all right. You go home to your wife now, Danny.
Try and get all that smoke and mud out of your head, eh?
translation.ko: 연기며 진흙이며 이제 그만 생각해 그럴게요, 죄송해요

translation.en: Yes, Mr. Shelby. I'm sorry.
Go on.
Mr. Shelby, you have to do something about him.
Damn right, Harry.
You pay the Peaky Blinders a lot of money for protection.
translation.ko: 자네도 피키 블라인더스에 상납을 하고 보호를 받잖아

translation.en: You're the law around here now, Tommy, aren't you?
Maybe you should put a bullet in Danny Whiz-Bang's head
translation.ko: 말 죽이듯이 대니 머리통도 총으로 쏴야겠네

translation.en: Maybe you'll have to put a bullet in my head someday, too.
translation.ko: 언젠가는 내 머리통에 총을 쏠지도 모르겠군

translation.en: Bring the bill to the Peaky Blinders.
translation.ko: 피키 블라인더스 앞으로 피해액 달아 놔

translation.en: We'll take care of it.
Look at the gun.
You recognize it?
Mmm.
Get up off your ass, you umping pig.
Aunt Poll! What the fuck did you do that for?
Finn was playing with this, this afternoon by the Cut.
translation.ko: 아까 핀이 이거 가지고 놀더라 장전도 돼 있었어 에이다 가슴이 날아갈 뻔했다

translation.en: It was loaded. Nearly blew Ada's tits off.
translation.ko: 장전도 돼 있었어 에이다 가슴이 날아갈 뻔했다

translation.en: It must've fell out of my pocket.
translation.ko: 주머니에서 떨어졌나 봐요 핀 말로는 도박장 탁자 위에

translation.en: He said he found it on the sideboard
of the betting shop, with bullets in it.
I... I must have been drunk.
When are you not drunk?
Look, Aunt Pol. I'm sorry.
I'm... I'm sorry.
Keep this between ourselves,
translation.ko: 이번 일은 비밀로 해 주지 단, 다시는 이런 실수 하지 마

translation.en: if you swear not to leave guns lying around.
translation.ko: 단, 다시는 이런 실수 하지 마

translation.en: Look, I know having four kids without a woman is hard,
translation.ko: 엄마 없이 아이 넷 키우는 게 힘들다는 건 알지만

translation.en: but my boot is harder. Now come on, we're late.
translation.ko: 다음엔 안 봐줘 얼른 가자, 늦었어

translation.en: [Arthur] Right, I've called this family meeting
translation.ko: 맞아 중요한 소식이 있어서 가족회의를 소집했어

translation.en: because I've got some very important news.
Scud boat and Love lock got back from Belfast last night.
translation.ko: 우리 조직 똘마니 둘이 어제 벨파스트에 다녀왔어

translation.en: They were buying a stallion to cover their mares.
They were in a pub on Shank hill Road yesterday
and in that pub there was a copper,
handing out these.
"If you're over five feet and can fight, come to Birmingham."
translation.ko: '키 150cm 이상 싸움에 자신 있으면 버밍엄으로 오세요'

translation.en: They're recruiting Protestant Irishmen to come over here as Specials.
translation.ko: 개신교 아일랜드인 특별 경찰을 여기로 소집 중이야

translation.en: - To do what? - [Thomas] To clean up the city, Ada.
He's the Chief Inspector.
The last four years he's been clearing the IRA out of Belfast.
How do you know so bloody much?
'Cause I asked the coppers on our payroll.
Why didn't you tell me?
I'm telling you.
Why send him to Birmingham?
There's been all these strikes at the BSA,
translation.ko: BSA에서 파업이 있었잖아요 오스틴 일도 있었고

translation.en: and the Austin works lately.
Now the papers are talking about sedition. And revolution.
I reckon it's communists he's after.
So this copper is gonna leave us alone, right?
There are Irishmen in Green Lanes who left Belfast to get away from him.
translation.ko: 그 경감을 피해 온 아일랜드인들 말로는 그한테 저항했던 가톨릭 신자는 전부 없어졌답니다

translation.en: Catholic men who crossed him used to disappear.
translation.ko: 그한테 저항했던 가톨릭 신자는 전부 없어졌답니다

translation.en: Yeah, but we ain't IRA. We bloody fought for the King.
translation.ko: 근데 우리는 IRA가 아니잖아 우린 국왕 폐하를 위해 싸웠어

translation.en: Anyway, we're Peaky Blinders.
- We're not scared of coppers. - He's right.
translation.ko: - 짭새 따위 안 무서워 - 맞아 우릴 괴롭히면 입을 다 찢어 주자고

translation.en: If they come for us, we'll cut them a smile each.
translation.ko: 우릴 괴롭히면 입을 다 찢어 주자고

translation.en: So, Arthur, is that it?
[Arthur] What do you think, Aunt Pol?
This family does everything open.
You have nothing more to say to this meeting, Thomas?
No.
Nothing that's women's business.
This whole bloody enterprise was women's business
translation.ko: 우리 여자들이 이 사업을 이끌었어 너희가 참전하는 동안 말이야

translation.en: while you boys were away at war.
What's changed?
We came back.
And the Lord will smite the unholy when the great judgment comes.
translation.ko: 신께서는 심판의 날에 불경한 이들을 벌하실 겁니다

translation.en: And judgment is coming, my friends.
Judgment is coming to this wicked city.
translation.ko: 저주받은 이 도시에 심판의 날이 오고 있습니다

translation.en: And your wickedness and your fornication
will be revealed.
You cannot hide from the Creator.
You cannot hide from the Almighty himself.
The Creator sees all.
You cannot hide from the true and living God.
[man] Get out of here!
Fuck off!
[woman] Go away!
That's it, I don't go any further.
I have ten minutes. What do you want?
An explanation.
I've always been able to tell when you're hiding something.
translation.ko: 네가 거짓말하는 거 난 바로 안다

translation.en: People round here talk.
Some of them work at the BSA.
I've been talking to wives of factory hands.
Detectives have been asking questions in the proofing shops.
Nothing happens in that factory without you knowing about it.
translation.ko: 네가 이 사실을 모를 리는 없을 거고

translation.en: Speak.
God and Aunt Polly are listening.
It was meant to be routine.
I had a buyer in London for some motorcycles.
I asked my men to steal me four bikes with petrol engines.
translation.ko: 애들한테 휘발유 엔진이 달린 오토바이를 훔쳐오라 했죠

translation.en: I'm guessing my men were drunk.
There's a still inside the factory makes tram line gin.
translation.ko: 공장 안에 술을 만드는 증류기가 있었거든요

translation.en: They picked up the wrong fucking crate.
The boys dropped it to Charlie Strong's yard as agreed.
translation.ko: 약속대로 찰리 삼촌네 창고로 상자를 가지고 왔는데

translation.en: They must've taken it from the proofing bay instead of the export bay.
Holy sweet baby of Mary.
Inside we found 25 Lewis machine guns,
10,000 rounds of ammunition,
50 semi-automatic rifles,
200 pistols with shells.
[Polly] Jesus, Tommy.
All bound for Libya.
Sitting right there in Charlie Strong's yard.
Tell me you threw them in the Cut.
We put them in the stables out of the rain.
The guns hadn't been greased yet.
So that's why they sent a copper from Belfast.
translation.ko: 이것 때문에 벨파스트에서 새 경감이 온 거야!

translation.en: Maybe. Maybe not.
Thomas, you're a bookmaker,
a robber, a fighting man, you are not a fool.
You sell those guns to anyone who has use for them, you will hang.
translation.ko: 그 총을 누군가에게 판다면 넌 사형이야

translation.en: Dump them somewhere the police can find them.
translation.ko: 경찰이 찾을 수 있는 곳에 갖다 버려

translation.en: Maybe if they know they haven't fallen into the wrong hands, this might blow over.
translation.ko: 경찰이 총만 다시 찾으면 조용히 지나갈 수 있어

translation.en: - Tell Charlie to dump them tonight. - No.
translation.ko: - 찰리에게 오늘 버리라고 해 - 안 돼요

translation.en: He won't move contraband under a full moon.
translation.ko: 보름달 뜨는 날에는 밀수품 운반 안 해요

translation.en: Three days until it wanes.
Then you'll do the right thing?
You have your mother's common sense, but your father's devilment.
translation.ko: 넌 네 어머니의 판단력과 아버지의 장난기를 닮았어

translation.en: I see them fighting.
Let your mother win.
I got tickets for the Penny Crush. They're showing a Tom Mix picture.
translation.ko: 나 영화 표 있어 톰 믹스가 주연이래

translation.en: I'm not in the mood for pictures, Ada.
translation.ko: 에이다 나 영화 볼 기분 아니야

translation.en: Well, I'm not doing it here again.
translation.ko: 여기서는 안 해 지난번에 흙투성이가 됐어

translation.en: I got covered in mud last time.
translation.ko: 여기서는 안 해 지난번에 흙투성이가 됐어 좀 걷자

translation.en: Let's just walk a bit. If we go down as far as Greet, we could go to a pub.
Your brothers have friends in Greet.
Everywhere. We'd have to walk to London.
translation.ko: 런던까지 가야 없을걸? 난 당신이 우리 오빠들 안 무서워해서 만나는 건데?

translation.en: You're the only man around here not scared of them.
translation.ko: 난 당신이 우리 오빠들 안 무서워해서 만나는 건데?

translation.en: Oh, I'm scared of them all right.
But you love me more than you fear them, right?
translation.ko: 오빠들 무서운 것보다 날 사랑하는 마음이 더 크지?

translation.en: I don't want to be always sneaking about.
- Soon, we'll tell them. - When?
How did the family meeting go?
Usual.
- There's a new copper coming. - I heard.
Mmm. And Tommy says he's after the likes of you.
translation.ko: 오빠 말로는 당신 같은 사람 잡으러 왔대

translation.en: So maybe you should burn your books and stop making speeches.
translation.ko: 그러니까 빨리 책부터 태우고 연설도 그만 다녀

translation.en: Oh, my Ada.
The only princess of the royal family of the kingdom of Small Heath.
I'm just a poor communist frog with a big mouth.
translation.ko: 나는 입만 산 가난한 공산주의자 개구리지

translation.en: - Give me a kiss, Princess Ada. - [giggles]
I'm here about the job as a barmaid.
- Are you mad? - Am I what?
Do you know about this place?
I saw it in an advertisement.
Job's been filled.
But it was in yesterday's paper.
Believe me, love, I'm doing you a favor.
I'm not asking for favors, I'm asking for employment.
translation.ko: 도움은 필요 없고요 전 일이 필요해요

translation.en: You're too... nice.
- How would you know? - Too pretty.
translation.ko: - 그걸 어떻게 아세요? - 얼굴도 너무 예쁘고

translation.en: They'd have you up against a wall.
I have experience.
And references.
What part of Ireland are you from?
- Galway. - Ah.
I worked in Dublin.
My mother was from Galway.
- You are too pretty. - Watch.
And listen.
? I wish I was ? ? In Carrickfergus ?
? Only for nights ? ? In Ballygrand ?
? I would swim over ? ? The deepest ocean ?
? The deepest ocean ? ? For my love to find ?
translation.ko: 그곳에서 내 사랑을 찾을 수 있을 텐데

translation.en: ? My boyhood friends ? ? And my own relations ?
? Have all passed on now ? ? Like the melting snow ?
In Ireland my singing made them cry and stopped them fighting.
translation.ko: 아일랜드에서는 제가 노래를 부르면 사람들이 싸움을 멈춰요

translation.en: I hope you know a lot of songs.
Babies.
Discarded with the fish bones and eggshells.
Girls.
11 years old.
Pierced and punctured by old men for three pence a time.
Rutted upon like animals.
Degradation.
Fathers with their daughters, brothers and sisters sharing beds.
Beggars and thieves left to run in the streets.
And astride the whole stinking pile of wounds and rotten flesh,
translation.ko: 그들의 상처와 썩은 살덩이의 악취가 도시에 진동하지

translation.en: your masters.
The men who you touch your cap to.
The Peaky Blinders.
The vicious, merciless gangs
who blind those who see
and cut out the tongues of those who talk.
You are worse than them.
Those of you who have taken their bribes these years since the war.
Those of you who have looked the other way,
you are worse than them.
God damn you for soiling your uniforms!
And then,
there are t he IRA Fenians
and the communists.
Blacker hearts still.
They feed on the puss of all this corruption
like maggots in a corpse!
And like maggots have left a swell
they will eventually swarm like flies
and spread their rotten philosophy
across the country and across the world.
Those then...
are our enemies.
A three-headed beast.
It is my job
to decapitate each one, and by God I will do it.
translation.ko: 이 머리 세 개를 모조리 참수하는 것이다

translation.en: I don't trust any of you
until you earn my trust...
and that takes some earning.
These are the new men who will bolster your ranks.
Good men from God-fearing families.
By the time the sun sets,
they will be sworn in and in uniform.
translation.ko: 이들은 제복을 입고 선서를 할 것이며

translation.en: And by sunrise tomorrow,
they will be on the streets.
God help those who stand in our way.
[woman] Sorry, Mr. Shelby.
- Right. - Get out of the way for Mr. Shelby.
- [man] Mr. Shelby. - [Arthur] This way.
You see, ladies?
When you're out with a Blinder,
you don't have to queue.
Right, I want a blow job off both of you
translation.ko: 좋아 사람들 들어오기 전에 둘이서 나 좀 즐겁게 해 봐

translation.en: before they let the ordinary people in.
translation.ko: 사람들 들어오기 전에 둘이서 나 좀 즐겁게 해 봐 준비됐지?

translation.en: Away you go. Take it out.
What the fuck?
Who the fuck are you?
I am Arthur fucking Shelby!
[Campbell] Arthur Shelby.
Lead pack dog of the Peaky Blinders.
Look at me.
[Arthur] Bastard!
[Campbell] Your uniform?
Terrifying, I'm sure.
- Did he have a gun? - [Moss] No gun.
Knife in his sock. Cosh in his belt.
Now, Mr. Shelby...
I want you to see this as me introducing myself to you.
translation.ko: 이건 나만의 특별한 내 소개 방식이야

translation.en: Understand?
In all the world,
the only thing that interests me is the truth.
So...
What do you know about the robbery?
translation.ko: 도난 사건에 대해 뭘 알고 있으신가?

translation.en: What robbery?
I will ask you again.
What do you know about the robbery?
translation.ko: 도난 사건에 대해 아는 거 전부 말해

translation.en: I swear to God,
I don't know what you're talking about.
What fucking robbery?
After 35 years of dealing with animals like you,
I can tell just by sniffing the air whether or not you are lying.
translation.ko: 네가 거짓말을 하는지 아닌지는 단번에 알 수 있어

translation.en: I'm not fucking lying! All right?
I'm not fucking lying.
I know.
I see nothing of interest behind the blood in your eyes.
And no blood in your veins that could carry
even a trace of cunning or guile.
But understand this.
It is well within my power
to have you and the rest of your scum family
face down in the canal before the year is out.
translation.ko: 내 힘으로 반드시 다 쓸어버릴 거야

translation.en: On the other hand...
we can help each other.
[Grace] Is it always this busy on a daytime?
No. These boys are on their way to St. Andrews.
translation.ko: 아니, 오늘은 다들 세인트앤드루스에 가느라 그래

translation.en: - Pray? - That'll be the day!
St. Andrews is a football ground. The Blues are playing.
That's the forward line there and that's the goalie, believe it or not.
translation.ko: 저쪽 애들이 공격수고 안 어울리지만 쟤는 골키퍼야 여기!

translation.en: I need a bottle of rum.
Grace? Whatever it is, it's on the house.
- A whole bottle? - Yeah.
- White or dark rum? - Don't care.
translation.ko: - 어떤 종류로요? - 상관없어 뭐 드릴까요? 두 잔?

translation.en: [Harry] Right, lads, what will it be, two?
Thank you.
Harry said it's on the house.
Are you a whore?
Because if you're not, you're in the wrong place.
He's one of them you warned me about.
Grace, you're a friendly girl, but be careful.
translation.ko: 네가 착한 건 알겠는데 그래도 조심해

translation.en: If I say something's on the house,
translation.ko: 내가 돈 받지 말라는 사람과는 말을 안 섞는 게 좋아

translation.en: then say nothing to whoever you're serving.
translation.ko: 내가 돈 받지 말라는 사람과는 말을 안 섞는 게 좋아 저들이 널 원한다고 하면 아무도 널 지켜줄 수 없어

translation.en: If they decide that they want you there's nothing anybody could do about it.
translation.ko: 저들이 널 원한다고 하면 아무도 널 지켜줄 수 없어 다행히 토마스는 프랑스에서 온 뒤로

translation.en: Lucky for you, since he got back from France,
translation.ko: 다행히 토마스는 프랑스에서 온 뒤로 여자를 안 찾지만 말이야

translation.en: Tommy doesn't want anybody at all. Yes, lads?
- Wipe the blood out of his eye. - You give orders?
translation.ko: - 눈에 피 좀 닦아내 - 네가 뭔데 명령이야?

translation.en: I'm a trained nurse.
Don't make me laugh, it hurts my face.
[Ada] I bloody am.
You went to one class in the church hall
translation.ko: 겨우 수업 하나 받았잖아 그마저도 딴짓하다가 쫓겨났지?

translation.en: and got thrown out for giggling.
translation.ko: 겨우 수업 하나 받았잖아 그마저도 딴짓하다가 쫓겨났지? 그래도 질식 막는 법은 배웠어

translation.en: Not before I learned to stop choking.
translation.ko: 그래도 질식 막는 법은 배웠어 내가 지금 질식하는 중이냐?

translation.en: I'm not bloody choking, am I?
translation.ko: 내가 지금 질식하는 중이냐? 내가 이 천으로 조르기 전에 닥쳐

translation.en: You will be when I wrap this cloth round your neck.
translation.ko: 내가 이 천으로 조르기 전에 닥쳐

translation.en: Let me see him. Well, have this.
Give me that.
You're all right.
He said Mr. Churchill sent him to Birmingham.
National interest, he said.
Something about a robbery.
He said he wants us to help him.
We don't help coppers.
He knew all about our war records.
He said we're patriots like him.
He wants us to be his eyes and ears.
I said...
I said we'd have a family meeting and take a vote.
Well, why not? Mmm?
We have no truck with Fenians or communists.
What's wrong with you?
What the fuck is wrong with him lately?
If I knew, I'd buy the cure from Compton's chemists.
? I am just a young girl ?
? I have just come over ?
? Over from the country ? ? Where they do things big ?
? And amongst the boys ? ? I have got myself a lover ?
translation.ko: 저 소년 중에 내 연인이 있어요

translation.en: ? And since I have a lover ?
? I don't care a thing ?
? The boy I love is up in the gallery ?
? The boy I love is looking at me ?
[Grace] ? Can't you see him standing there? ? ? Waving his handkerchief ?
translation.ko: 저 멀리서 나를 보며 손수건을 흔드네요

translation.en: ? As merry as a robin ?
? That sings on the tree ?
We haven't had singing in here since the war.
translation.ko: 전쟁 이후에 노래 안 한 거 아는데요

translation.en: Why do you think that is, Harry?
So did Arthur say...
what kind of a deal this new copper offered him?
translation.ko: 새로 온 경감이랑 무슨 거래를 했대?

translation.en: God. The second your balls are empty, it's back onto politics.
What did Tommy say?
He didn't say anything. You know what he's like.
translation.ko: 아무 말 안 했어 오빠 성격 알잖아

translation.en: Yeah, I know what he's like.
translation.ko: 그래, 잘 알지 곧장 싸우는 걸 좋아하잖아

translation.en: He likes to take his fights onto the mud.
translation.ko: 그래, 잘 알지 곧장 싸우는 걸 좋아하잖아 기다리는 건 못 참고

translation.en: Doesn't like to stand and wait.
translation.ko: 기다리는 건 못 참고 오빠가 우리 관계 알면 어떻게 할지 알지?

translation.en: You know what he'd do if he found out about us.
translation.ko: 오빠가 우리 관계 알면 어떻게 할지 알지? 해보라지

translation.en: Sometimes it's like you're with me just to show you can.
translation.ko: 그걸 보여 주려고 일부러 나랑 만나는 것 같아

translation.en: One day me and Tommy will be on the same side again.
translation.ko: 언젠가 나랑 토마스는 다시 같은 편이 될 거야

translation.en: [Danny] Tommy!
[Thomas] Danny!
Danny!
Hey, what you do? We're closed.
Go home!
Go home, crazy man. I said, go home, crazy man!
- I said, go home. - Fix bayonets!
Secretary of State, this is Chief Inspector Campbell.
Mr. Churchill, sir.
May I say what a great honor it is to meet you.
Bit of a whistle stop tour.
Love the hat, by the way.
Thank you.
It's beaver.
So, how are you settling in?
I have set up a command network.
I have agents in place across the city
who will act as my eyes and ears.
And I have begun to interrogate suspects vigorously.
You were in Belfast.
I understand you broke a few Fenian hearts.
A rat's nest, sir.
So who do you think stole the guns?
- The Fenians or the communists? - If it is the IRA Fenians,
I will find them and find the guns.
If it is communists, I will find them and find the guns.
If it is common criminals, I will find them and find the guns.
To me there is no distinction between any of the above.
translation.ko: 누가 저지른 짓이든 제 전략은 하나입니다

translation.en: Ah. We chose you because you are effective,
but remember this, Mr. Campbell,
this is England, not Belfast.
Bodies thrown in the rivers wash up in the papers here.
translation.ko: 강에 시체를 버리면 다음 날 기사가 바로 나와

translation.en: We must keep the existence of these stolen guns out of the news,
translation.ko: 절대 이 일이 언론에 알려지면 안 돼

translation.en: otherwise we're simply advertising them for sale.
translation.ko: 알려지면 무기를 판다고 광고하는 꼴이 돼

translation.en: If there are bodies to be buried,
dig holes,
and dig them deep.
I want everything accounted for,
down to the last bullet.
[Thomas] Uncle Charlie, a word.
They are aboard. There's no moon.
We can take them out to the turning point beyond Gas Street and leave them on the bank.
translation.ko: 가스 거리를 지나서 둑에 두고 올게

translation.en: They'll be found by railway men first thing.
Is that agreement?
I changed my mind.
You what?
I have an alternative strategy.
Tell Curly to take her out to the old tobacco wharf.
translation.ko: 컬리한테 예전에 쓰던 선창에 갖다 놓으라 하세요

translation.en: There's a lock-up mooring we used to keep cigarettes.
He knows it.
When the boat leaves your yard, it's no longer your concern.
translation.ko: 배가 창고에서 떠나면 더는 신경 안 쓰셔도 돼요

translation.en: Have you lost your fucking mind?
Have you not seen the streets?
They've sent a fucking army to find these things.
translation.ko: 이거 찾으려고 군대가 깔렸어 맞아요, 패를 보여 준 거예요

translation.en: That's right. They've shown their hand.
Their hand?
If they want them back this bad, they'll have to pay.
translation.ko: 그렇게 급한 물건이면 값을 치러야죠 그게 세상 이치예요

translation.en: That's the way of the world.
Fortune drops something valuable into your lap, you don't dump it on the bank of the Cut.
translation.ko: 거금이 머리 위로 떨어졌는데 그걸 그냥 갖다 버려요?

translation.en: You're blood, Tommy.
I've always looked out for you like a dad.
You're going to bring holy hell down on your head.
This copper takes no prisoners.
I'm told he didn't serve.
Reserved occupation.
Is it another war you're looking for, Tommy?
The tobacco wharf.
By order of the Peaky Blinders.
Are you in position?
I am, sir.
Your first impressions.
I am quite shocked at how these people live.
Have you found anything out that might help me?
I interrogated the head of the Peaky Blinders.
He didn't know anything.
It strikes me that it isn't Arthur who heads the Shelby family.
translation.ko: 셸비 가문의 우두머리는 아서가 아니에요 그 동생이죠

translation.en: It is the younger one,
They say he won two medals for gallantry in the war.
You sound fascinated.
However, my opinion has not changed.
The bookmaker gangs have other business and the communists are too weak to have planned this.
translation.ko: 마권업자 조직은 도박장을 하고 공산주의자들은 힘이 없어요

translation.en: I believe the guns were taken by the IRA.
You must not let your personal history cloud your judgment.
What history?
That the IRA murdered my father will not affect my judgment.
translation.ko: IRA가 제 부친을 살해했다고 제 판단력이 흐려지진 않아요

translation.en: If you see any guns,
check the serial numbers against that list.
Your father
was the finest officer I ever worked with.
I know he'd be very, very proud of you.
Danny, as you know, the man you killed was Italian.
And those two men over there are his brothers.
translation.ko: 저기 있는 두 사람은 그 사람 동생들이야

translation.en: If I let the Italians do this, Danny,
they'll cut off your manhood and let you drain.
translation.ko: 저들이 네 성기를 자르고 널 물에 처넣을 거야

translation.en: That's how those bastards do things.
So, to stop a war breaking out between us and the Italians,
and to save you from their barbarity...
translation.ko: 아까 얘기한 험한 꼴 당하지 않으려면

translation.en: I said I would dispatch you myself.
They are here to witness.
I died over there anyway, Tommy.
I left my fucking brains in the mud.
You have any last requests, comrade?
You'll look out for my Rosie and my boys.
See they get apprenticeships.
At the BSA factory or the Austin.
And they'll make foremen. I know they will.
Just ordinary.
Just ordinary men.
And they won't get told to do the shit,
translation.ko: 우리가 했던 더러운 짓들은 안 하고요

translation.en: the shit, the shit that we got told to do.
translation.ko: 어쩔 수 없이 해야 했던 더러운 짓들 말이에요

translation.en: I suppose I ought to pray now.
Those fucking guns, they blew God right out of my head.
Is that boat for me?
We have to get your body out of the city, Danny.
This new copper, you know...
translation.ko: 새로운 경감이 빡빡해 진흙 근처에는 묻지 말아 줘요

translation.en: Don't bury me anywhere there's mud. Okay?
Promise me.
Bury me on a hill.
And tell Rosie where.
You were a good man
and a good soldier.
Yes, Sergeant Major.
In the bleak midwinter.
[Arthur] Where are you?
It bloody won!
Monaghan Boy bloody won!
Yeah. It won.
And word will spread.
So the next time we do the powder trick,
it won't just be the Garrison that'll bet on the horse,
it'll be the whole of Small Heath. And you know what?
translation.ko: 스몰 히스 사람들 전부 그 말에 돈을 걸 거야

translation.en: The horse will win again.
And the third time we do it,
we'll have the whole of Birmingham betting on it.
translation.ko: 모든 버밍엄 사람이 그 말에 돈을 걸 거고 판돈은 몇천 파운드가 되겠지

translation.en: 1,000-quid bet on the magic horse.
And that time,
when we are ready,
the horse will lose.
Think about it.
[Charlie] You okay, Danny?
I'm still in shock.
Are you sure this isn't heaven?
If it was heaven, what would I be doing here?
translation.ko: 여기가 천국이면 내가 왜 이러고 있겠냐?

translation.en: Tommy wanted you to think it was real,
to try and knock some sense into you.
A shell full of sheep brains hurts pretty bad.
translation.ko: 양 뇌로 꽉 찬 총알도 꽤 아프네요

translation.en: Ah, it was meant to.
So where are you taking me?
London. Tommy has a little job for you.
Give you a chance to say thanks.
You're a Peaky Blinder now, Danny.
[Polly] A bad week.
There was no moon last night.
I checked.
- Did you do the right thing? - Yes. I did the right thing.
